channel.title: A problem, well, a few
channel.description:
Okay, i've got a server up and running (with testscape) and my friends can get online, but...
- Whenever someone logs in they're level 126
- Whenever someone logs in they're a level 3 admin :o
- Only one person can log in at a time, and if someone else tries to log in it causes me to log out :eek:
Theres either something freakishly wrong or, i'm an idiot.
Can anyone help please? Thanks.

item.title: A problem, well, a few
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

It’s mainly because the server is down, ask the owner on hamachi if it’s up or not, If it is ask im for help connecting.

Read full topic

item.title: A problem, well, a few
item.dc:creator: @sps93 sps93
item.description:
@sps93 wrote:

Can anyone here help me even log into the server?!?!?! Because I’ve got Hamachi downloaded, the mopar screen came up and the log in screen is there, but it never les me log in it always say : Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.
But I’ll do exactly that and it still won’t work!!! PLEASE!!!SOME ONE HELP ME!!

Read full topic

item.title: A problem, well, a few
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

To stop people being level 126 and rights level 3 go to character file and got to a file called Donottouch. Change those rights to 0 and those stats to 1 except hp which u change to 10.

Save and close and now new people will have that.

As for the logging out bit put up the max players as Mrquater said

Read full topic

item.title: A problem, well, a few
item.dc:creator: @Mugsy Mugsy
item.description:
@Mugsy wrote:

Hmm, i’ll try that - but i don’t see how having the maximum players would log me out

Thanks

Read full topic

item.description:

I realy dont know, try searching playerhandler for maxplayers and making it 50

item.title: A problem, well, a few

item.description:
@Mugsy wrote:

Okay, i’ve got a server up and running (with testscape) and my friends can get online, but…

  • Whenever someone logs in they’re level 126

  • Whenever someone logs in they’re a level 3 admin :o

  • Only one person can log in at a time, and if someone else tries to log in it causes me to log out :eek:

Theres either something freakishly wrong or, i’m an idiot.

Can anyone help please? Thanks.
